summary: RE NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER 02V293000.  CONSUMER STATES HORN AND CRUISE CONTROL WAS INOPERTAIVE, AND THE AIRBAG LIGHT WAS ON.   DEALER REPLACED CLOCKSPRING PER RECALL 02V293000.  CONSUMER STATED CHRYSLER HAS MADE IT DIFFICULT TO RECEIVE REIMBURSEMENT FOR RECALL REPAIRS WHICH WERE PAID AT OWNERS EXPENSE.   *TT   *NLM
